item.title: U.S. Is Missing the Century’s ‘Greatest Economic Opportunity,’ U.N. Chief Says
item.description: In a speech on renewable energy, António Guterres cited “clear market distortion” in favor of fossil fuels by President Trump and others but called th...

item.title: U.S. Says It Will Withdraw From UNESCO, Again
item.description: A decision to pull out of UNESCO was the latest move by the Trump administration to cut ties with international organizations.

item.title: Air India Finds ‘No Issues’ After Inspections of Boeing Fuel Switches
item.description: An investigation into a deadly crash last month has focused on control switches that cut off fuel to an Air India Boeing jet after takeoff.

item.title: Iran’s Leaders Turn to a New Brand of Nationalism After Israeli and U.S. Attacks
item.description: The theocratic government is repurposing folklore and patriotic anthems as it seeks to channel national outrage into increasing its support at home.

item.title: Zelensky’s Government Takes Aim at Corruption Fighters
